resources.string: An aspiring Android Developer, currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science Engineering.

~Currently pursuing B.Tech focused in Computer Science and Engineering from IGDTUW-Delhi, I can be best described as a dedicated learner with a strong determination to achieve my goals. ~Skilled in Java, Python and C/C++, I aspire to get into the field of Android Application Development moving forward. I have taken up courses offered by Google in the fields of IT Automation, Data Serialization, API Interaction, Cloud Configuration and Management ,and System Administration. ~I have demonstrated my team management skills while being an Event Coordinator for Taarangana -annual cultural fest of IGDTUW. I maybe reached out at : guptaagrima200@gmail.com
